nodes.text: The Auditor was an Imperial Customs corvette that was used by the Galactic Empire during the time of the Galactic Civil War.

At some point during the Galactic Civil War, the Auditor captured the smuggler Vordell. Rather than be convicted of his crimes, Vordell made a deal with the crew of the Auditor, to help them recover a missing cargo of blaster rifles in return for his freedom. The Auditor then traveled to the moon Phinel's Folly, where Vordell had previously made arrangements with a group of freelance agents for the missing rifles to be brought. Vordell and a detachment from the Auditor then ambushed the agents on the moon's surface.
